job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

jd: From: Naveen Kumar, iTechUS naveen.t@itechus.net Reply to: naveen.t@itechus.net Hi,My name is Naveen Kumar, and I represent iTech US Inc. iTech is a global staff augmentation firm providing a wide-range of talent on-demand and total workforce solutions. We have job opening for the below role. Role: Java Developer with ReactLocation: Quincy, MA (Strictly Locals only)Duration: ContractExperience: 10+ yearsNote: F2F interview mandateVisa: H1B for C2C, other visa on W2 Role Description:Design, develop, and maintain Java-based applications.Build and optimize user interfaces using React.js.Collaborate with the product and design teams to translate requirements into technical specifications.Write efficient, reusable, and maintainable code following best practices.Integrate front-end elements with server-side logic.Develop APIs and backend services using Java frameworks such as Spring or Spring Boot.Conduct unit testing, debugging, and performance tuning to ensure code quality.Stay up to date with the latest Java and React.js technologies and frameworks.Collaborate in Agile development teams, contributing to project planning, code reviews, and sprints.Troubleshoot and resolve software defects in a timely manner.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.3+ years of experience in Java development, preferably with Spring or Spring Boot.2+ years of experience in front-end development using React.js.Strong understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and design patterns.Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services.Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+).Familiarity with database technologies (e.g., SQL, MySQL, MongoDB).Experience with version control systems such as Git.Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.Excellent communication and teamwork skills. Thanks & RegardsNaveen KumariTechUS, Inc
